TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DataGridComboBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 表示將 控制項裝載於其儲存格內的 資料行。

span.span: Represents a column that hosts controls in its cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用顯示的資料沒有一組可供選擇，例如列舉的項目。Use to display data where there is a set of items to choose from, such as an enumeration. 可讓使用者從下拉式清單中選取項目。 allows users to select an item from a drop-down list. 下圖顯示。The following illustration shows a . ![DataGridComboBoxColumn](~/add/media/ndp-datagridcombobox.png "DataGridComboBoxColumn")![A DataGridComboBoxColumn](~/add/media/ndp-datagridcombobox.png "A DataGridComboBoxColumn") 若要填入下拉式清單中，第一組屬性藉由使用下列選項之一：To populate the drop-down list, first set the property for the by using one of the following options: - 靜態資源。A static resource. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [StaticResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)。For more information, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md). - X： 靜態程式碼實體。An x:Static code entity. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For more information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md). - 內嵌集合型別。An inline collection of types. 一次設定中，繫結中的選取項目至儲存格的資料列的資料項目。Once the is set, bind the selected item in the to the data item for the row that the cell is in. 您可以使用下列屬性之一，以設定繫結：You can set the binding by using one of the following properties: |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||設定目前選取的項目文字的繫結路徑。Sets the binding path of the text for the currently selected item.| ||設定目前選取之物件的繫結路徑。Sets the binding path of the object that is currently selected.| ||選取的項目所指定的值會設定繫結路徑屬性。Sets the binding path to the value of the selected item specified by the property.| 當屬性設定為`true`使用者無法編輯資料行，他們將無法查看下拉式清單。When the property is set to `true`, users cannot edit the column and they will not be able to see the drop-down list. 如果您想要顯示其他類型的資料，提供下列資料行類型：If you want to display other types of data, provides the following column types: |資料行型別Column Type|資料顯示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||若要顯示的 URI 資料的使用。Use to display URI data.| ||使用此選項，來顯示布林值的資料。Use to display Boolean data.| ||使用此選項，來顯示文字。Use to display text.| 如果您想要使用其他控制項，在您，您可以使用，以建立您自己的資料行類型。If you want to use other controls in your , you can create your own column types by using . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以填入下拉式清單，每個列舉之值的資料行中。The following example shows how to populate the drop-down list for each in the column with the values of an enumeration. 在下拉式清單中選取的項目藉由設定繫結屬性，以每個資料列中顯示物件的屬性。The selected item in the drop-down list is bound by setting the property to the property of the object displayed in each row. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CustomColumns#ComboBox1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml#combobox1)] [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CustomColumns#ComboBox2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml#combobox2)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Top](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#top)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Top](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#top)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#All2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#all2)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#All2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#all2)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#CustomerClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#customerclass)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#CustomerClass](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#customerclass)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Enum](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#enum)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Enum](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#enum)]
